sub_title: Managing Director | Colombia at Capitalize2day “All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.” -Walt Disney.
summary:
Founded in 2016 by Toine Diters and Robert-Jan van Kempen (The Netherlands), Capitalize2day is a boutique corporate finance company with an international scope. Currently the company has offices in: The Netherlands, Bulgaria and Colombia.

As a financial intermediary, Capitzalize2day finances through the banking sector, but more often through alternative financing parties (mostly loans without collateral, up to approx. 20-25 million). 

Capitalize2day is specialized in financing, M&A, structuring your company and expanding your business abroad. Currently I am responsible for starting the offices in Colombia (Bogota and Medellin) for Capitalize2day.

Capitalize2day can help you expand your business activities to South America, Eastern Europe and Asia. However, we also help non-Dutch companies start their businesses in/expand to the Netherlands (Western Europe). Capitalize2day assists companies in executing buy-build strategies within this geographical area and give substance to an active international growth strategy.


Capitalize2day works closely together with local partners who provide staffing (talent sourcing and recruitment) for almost all industries, but with a focus on C-level staff, IT, e-commerce and digital marketing. These partners help our clients to quickly set up a back-office and grow their company. Additional services offered by Capitlize2day through our partner network include: providing suitable office space, legal assistance and on-site accountancy services.  

We have local offices at:

The Netherlands - Hilversum, Laren
Bulgaria - Varna, Sofia
Colombia - Bogota, Medellin
Hong Kong
Japan, Yokohama, Kanagawa
